column1: In all seriousness, though. If you've ever had a flu before, and you made it out okay, you'll probably be alright if you catch the coronavirus. It's just a worse flu. It'll mess up the vulnerable people, and there isn't a vaccine for it yet, which is why everyone's freaking out.

Then what's their boarder situation got to do with covid19? Top post says "border controls mean no viruses", person replies "I got in fine as a tourist", you say "tourism isn't the same as border controls" What's being said, then?
